Actions.Name: Create a new release
Actions.Description: Create a release, based on an existing release definition.

Actions.Name: Create a work item
Actions.Description: Create a new work item with the provided attributes.

Actions.Name: Get query results [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Get query results instead.
Retrieves the result of a work item query.

Actions.Name: Get query results
Actions.Description: Retrieves the result of a work item query.

Actions.Name: Get work item children
Actions.Description: Get a list of children (max size 1000) of a single work item.

Actions.Name: Get work item details
Actions.Description: Get the details of a single work item.

Actions.Name: Send an HTTP request to Azure DevOps
Actions.Description: Construct an Azure DevOps REST API request to invoke. Please refer to the following link for all available endpoints: https://docs.microsoft.com/rest/api/azure/devops

Actions.Name: List Organizations
Actions.Description: Retrieves the list of Organizations the user is a member of.

Actions.Name: List Git repositories
Actions.Description: Retrieves the list of Git repositories in a project.

Actions.Name: List iterations
Actions.Description: Retrieves the list of iterations for a project.

Actions.Name: List pipeline runs
Actions.Description: Gets top 10000 runs for a particular pipeline

Actions.Name: List pipelines
Actions.Description: Retrieves the list of pipelines in a project.

Actions.Name: List projects
Actions.Description: Retrieves the list of projects in an Organization.

Actions.Name: List queries within folder
Actions.Description: Retrieves the list of work item queries within a folder for a given project.

Actions.Name: List release definitions
Actions.Description: Retrieves the list of release definitions associated with a project.

Actions.Name: List root level queries
Actions.Description: Retrieves the list of root-level work item queries in a project.

Actions.Name: List work items
Actions.Description: Returns a list of work items.

Actions.Name: List work item types
Actions.Description: Retrieves the list of Work Item Types accessible in a given Azure DevOps project.

Actions.Name: When a build completes
Actions.Description: Triggers a flow when a build completes.

Actions.Name: When a pull request is closed (Git)
Actions.Description: Triggers a flow when a pull request which matches provided criteria is closed.

Actions.Description: Triggers a flow when a pull request which matches provided criteria is created.

Actions.Name: When code is pushed (Git)
Actions.Description: Triggers a flow when code is pushed to a Git repository.

Actions.Name: When code is checked in (TFVC)
Actions.Description: Triggers a flow when code is checked in to a Team Foundation Version Control project.
